thread.section_title: Novotel Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent base
thread.title_full: Excellent base - Review of Novotel Paris La Defense, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: Editress61
title: Excellent base
text:
Attending a conference at palais des congres, so this hotel couldn't have been better placed. A few stops on the Metro from door to door.
All staff in hotel were friendly and helpful. Most spoke excellent English, but even those who did not were friendly in French!
The cafe was lovely - did not expect anything with truffles in a Novotel, but then again, this is Paris!
Only slight gripe is that the room was very hot - and one cannot open the hermetically sealed windows, so all very stifling. However, as I had a view of the Eifel Tower, and in the distance, Sacre Couer, I managed!
Would recommend
